description:
Season: 19
Original Air Date: 12/14/2005

Eric continues to work on his plan to regain control of Forrester Creations.  He meets Stephanie for a drink and convinces her that Brooke has horrible ideas for the company.  He also reminds Stephanie how sorry he is for the way he has treated her.  Stephanie falls right in to the trap.  Nick makes the decision to tell Bridget about his son.  When he mentions to her that Felicia has a baby boy Bridget knows that it belongs to Nick.
